page.title: 03FARM BUILDINGS
page.content: Dunhampton and Gt Horton farms were both old but Dunhampton had been completely renovated and looked like a new house.The Gt Horton farm house,however,was exactly the same as it would have been 100 years ago.It was also very comfortable and homely, it had an open fire and the rooms were large and spacious.Both farms were owned by companys,Gt Horton was owned by Scottish Amiccable,an insurance company which invests some of its money in land and Dunhampton was owned by W.A.Sylvesters Ltd.a company controlled by the farmers family.
